original_text: And the sons of Israel came to buy corn among those that came: for the famine was in the land of Canaan.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 아들들이 양식 사러 간 자 중에 있으니 가나안 땅에 기근이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Israel came to buy corn
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 아들들이 와서 곡식을 사려고 했으며

sentences.original_text: for the famine was in the land of Canaan
